MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:05pm following reports of a damaged underground cable caused by a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35am on the 8th of December 2020.
